title: Jeremy Clarkson shows off epic weight loss after the Queen's dieting tip
text:

Jeremy Clarkson has swapped the steaks for salads - and it shows.

The Grand Tour presenter showed off his smaller waistline at a recent London event, as he cuddled up to gorgeous girlfriend Lisa Hogan.

Jeremy, 59, recently dished on how he managed to lose a whopping two stone using a handy tip from Her Majesty The Queen herself.

Now he's able to flaunt the results.

Jeremy and Lisa looked the picture of sophistication at Fatima Bhutto's book launch at Nolita Social in London on Wednesday evening.

Jeremy opted for the jeans, jacket and shirt look, one that he's very fond of.

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for LDV)

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for LDV)

Blond beauty Lisa decided on a simple but chic white T-shirt and jeans, and cut a stunning figure with her straight blond locks parted in the middle.

The secret behind Jeremy's weight loss wasn't kept a secret for long, as he previously dished on how he managed it.

Chatting with The Sun about exercise, he laughed: "No, no that would be unseemly. The Queen doesn't go to the gym and she doesn't run and she's 93 and she's alright.

(Image: BBC/Hat Trick/Richard Kendall)

"Apparently she only has a forkful, she only has a tiny bit, that's what I've heard. She'll sit down and just have one little bit of mousse a bit of lettuce leaf."

On The Jonathan Ross Show, Jeremy revealed that he'd taken some time out to go abroad, and that had helped him get a handle on his physique.

The driving expert said: "I went on a gap year! I went on a gap year to Indochina. They just have a better diet out there.

"Plus I had a bicycle rather than a car. Cycling is not a good thing to do, I'm all broken as a result of it but I did lose a lot of weight. Where I was staying was separated from the small town by a mountain but it was much bigger than Everest.

"It was only three kilometres and I cycled it every day. I said, 'I can't have a drink unless I cycle into town.' I wanted to get fit."
description: Jeremy had the shed the pounds by using the Queen's technique of only eating a tony amount and keeping it healthy
